execution_plan.description: Find users (id, username, full_name) who have sent more than a given number of messages; return their message counts.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.full_name, COUNT(m.id) AS messages_count
FROM messages m
JOIN users u ON m.sended_by = u.id
GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.full_name
HAVING COUNT(m.id) > $min_messages;
